dc:title: There is No Time With God
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Meditation on dying and praying for the dead. Enumerates the many people on a list kept in her missal. Recalls that Fr. Zachery, her confessor, taught her that "There is no time with God."
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 657 1953-11-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
